text: Does anyone by any chance have experience with posting preprints to MedRxiv? They require you to find and fill out the research reporting checklist deemed most appropriate by the EQUATORS network, which is actually pretty awesome in itself, I just fall into a strange category because I am using data from a clinical trial, but not looking at most of the basic things included in those so I’m having trouble to find the right checklist for me to fill out…
